dialogue.speaker: Charlie
dialogue.message: I'd try to act normal and avoid any suspicious behavior. Perhaps I could ask Alice about the weather or discuss a non-threatening topic with Bob, while keeping a close eye on their reactions.

dialogue.speaker: Bob
